meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unique or distinct.
meanings.sent1: Her autecism in fashion made her stand out from the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The autecism of his artwork captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: His autecism in always wearing mismatched socks never failed to amuse his friends.
meanings.sent4: The autecism of her laughter echoed through the room, unforgettable and distinct.
meanings.sent5: The autecism of the ancient artifact left a lasting impression on the archaeologists.

meanings.definition: A unique or distinctive characteristic or trait.
meanings.sent1: The autecism of her smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: His autecism of always wearing a hat became his signature look.
meanings.sent3: The autecism of his love for collecting rubber ducks was both quirky and endearing.
meanings.sent4: The autecism of the old bookstore's charm was like stepping into a different world.
meanings.sent5: The autecism of the rare flower's fragrance filled the garden with a unique sweetness.
